subject: Climate & Environment
title: The Gulf Stream and Europe's Warmth
description: Learn The Gulf Stream and Europe's Warmth in one minute.

hook.text: London sits at the same latitude as Labrador, Canada. London is mild. Labrador is frozen.

buildup.text: The Gulf Stream carries warm water from the Gulf of Mexico northeast toward Europe.

discovery.text: This warm current raises northwestern Europe's temperature by 5 to 10Â°C above what it should be.

twist.text: Melting Greenland ice is adding fresh water to the North Atlantic, weakening the Gulf Stream.

climax.text: The current has already slowed by about 15% since the mid-20th century.

punchline.text: Europe's mild winters depend on a current that's losing its strength.

quiz.question: Why is Europe warmer than regions at the same latitude?
options: The Gulf Stream carries warm water from the tropics
The ozone layer is thicker over Europe
